title: ROHAN EKAM
detail: Rohan Ekam offers an exceptional living experience with its 2, 3, 4, and 4.5 BHK residences. These thoughtfully designed homes blend modern aesthetics with functional elegance, featuring premium modular kitchens, advanced climate control systems, and sleek glass partitions. Residents can enjoy expansive private balconies, lush green landscapes, and a host of upscale amenities, including a well-equipped fitness center and a contemporary clubhouse. Rohan Ekam is where contemporary living meets sophistication, providing a serene and stylish sanctuary in a prime location.
developer_detail: Rohan Builders is a renowned real estate developer in India, known for its residential and commercial projects. With a focus on quality construction and innovative design, they create spaces that blend luxury and functionality. Rohan Builders is committed to sustainable development practices, ensuring that their projects meet the evolving needs of their clients while also preserving the environment.
city_description: Balewadi, strategically located near major IT hubs in Pune, offers excellent connectivity and a thriving social infrastructure. Its diverse housing options cater to various budgets, while the presence of the Shree Shiv Chhatrapati Sports Complex adds a unique appeal. Balewadi High Street provides a vibrant shopping and dining experience, and the nearby Baner Pashan Biodiversity Park and Pashan Lake offer a tranquil retreat. With its blend of urban convenience and natural beauty, Balewadi is a sought-after destination for residents and businesses alike.
